Bomb Array
by Sly Dog Studios

You have been called in to level various buildings that are harboring ninja terrorists! Using your plane and bomb-aiming skill, drop bombs until you finish them off, then move to the next area.
Press Start to begin gameplay. Press the 'A' button to drop a bomb when you feel the timing is right. If you get to 1,000 points, you win! If you crash into a building, you FAIL.


https://slydogstudios.org/
